tpwm.title: Mouse Bindings for Zigli's Editor
tpwm.body:
Double Click of either left or right button will refresh the buffer. Useful if the keyboard locks up. All the rest are single click.
Left Mouse
Modifier or ContextCommand In background windowExpands a single window. Tiles multiple windows. In buffer Sets current file name in status line ShiftHighlight from current cursor position CtrlCycle buffers AltPaste
Right Mouse
Modifier or ContextCommand In background windowNew Buffer (click on `Cancel' to start with a default file) On a menu item or clickpad itemBrings up Help for that item. Buffer backgroundBrings up UniPop Menu: first line shows font information, any Unicode menus chosen from the UniBlox master menu will appear here along with alphabet, clickpad, and quickwords menus. Includes Modes Menu for setting the mode. Shift, on a word or highlighted textHighlights. Brings up the Dictionary/Thesaurus menu for that selection. CtrlCut highlighted text Alt-ShiftBrings up Dictionary-In dialog box for entering Dictionary/Thesaurus information for word or selection.
Middle Mouse
Modifier or ContextCommand Buffer Paste
